import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Employee } from 'src/app/Models/employee.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-employee', templateUrl: './add-employee.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-employee.component.css'] }) export class AddEmployeeComponent implements OnInit { addEmployeeReq: Employee = { id: '' , name: '', phone: 0, salary: 0, email: '', department: '' }; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
